languages.text: {n}Любые попытки запомнить материал обречены на провал — через час имена, даты и события перемешиваются в кашу.{/n}
{n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Любые попытки запомнить материал обречены на провал — через час имена, даты и события перемешиваются в кашу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Any attempts to commit the lecture's contents to memory are soon doomed to failure — after one hour, the names, dates, and events all become an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}
{n}Any attempts to commit the lecture's contents to memory are soon doomed to failure — after one hour, the names, dates, and events all become an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}
{n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}
{n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}
{n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}
{n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il vous est absolument impossible de mémoriser tout ce que vous raconte Abélard. Au bout d'une heure, cette succession de noms, de dates et d'événements n'est plus qu'un fatras sans queue ni tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous est absolument impossible de mémoriser tout ce que vous raconte Abélard. Au bout d'une heure, cette succession de noms, de dates et d'événements n'est plus qu'un fatras sans queue ni tête.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentar recordar la lección de Abelard es una causa perdida. Tras una hora de nombres, fechas y eventos, todo se mezcla en un amasijo incomprensible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentar recordar la lección de Abelard es una causa perdida. Tras una hora de nombres, fechas y eventos, todo se mezcla en un amasijo incomprensible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试图把阿贝拉德讲的内容记下来，但徒劳无功。整整一个小时的解说充斥着各种各样的名字、日期与事件，你脑子里的一切都变成了一锅粥。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试图把阿贝拉德讲的内容记下来，但徒劳无功。整整一个小时的解说充斥着各种各样的名字、日期与事件，你脑子里的一切都变成了一锅粥。{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドの講義の内容を記憶に留めるのは難しい。1時間も名前、日付、出来事などを沢山聞いていると、すべてが理解不能なごちゃまぜになってしまう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドの講義の内容を記憶に留めるのは難しい。1時間も名前、日付、出来事などを沢山聞いていると、すべてが理解不能なごちゃまぜになってしまう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist ein vergebliches Unterfangen, dir die Einzelheiten von Abelards Vortrag merken zu wollen. Nach einer Stunde voller Namen, Daten und Ereignissen verschwimmt alles zu einem unverständlichen Brei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist ein vergebliches Unterfangen, dir die Einzelheiten von Abelards Vortrag merken zu wollen. Nach einer Stunde voller Namen, Daten und Ereignissen verschwimmt alles zu einem unverständlichen Brei.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın anlattığı şeylerin içeriğini hafızana yazmaya çalışmak beyhude bir çaba. Bir saate yayılmış isimlerden, tarihlerden ve olaylardan sonra hepsi kafanda birbirinden ayırt edilemez bir karmaşa hâline geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is a lost cause to try and commit the contents of Abelard's lecture to memory — after an hour of names, dates, and events, it all becomes an incomprehensible jumble.{/n}
